institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 26 (Composition and Operation of Consortium Steering Committee)
contents: Article 26 (Formation and operation of the consortium steering committee) ① The joint training center must form a “Consortium Steering Committee (hereinafter referred to as the ‘Steering Committee’)” in accordance with Article 15 of the Regulations. In this case, the joint training center must prepare and operate internal regulations that include matters related to the composition of the steering committee. ② The joint training center must hold a steering committee meeting at least once per half year. ③ The Steering Committee opens with the attendance of a majority of registered members, and makes decisions with the approval of a majority of the Steering Committee members present. However, if the head of the steering committee deems it urgent or minor, a decision may be made in writing. ④ The chairman of the steering committee shall be the head of the joint training center or the general manager of the consortium project. However, Corporation employees or business associates of the joint training center cannot participate as steering committee members (other joint training center business associates may participate within 20% of the steering committee members).
